      • createFile

        public static <K,V> void createFile(java.util.HashMap<K,V> frequency,
                                    java.lang.String frequencyName)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Create the output file for the frequencies methods
        Type Parameters:
        K - Name of the frequency key
        V - Value of the frequencies
        Parameters:
        frequency - List of frequencies from the PCMs
        frequencyName - Name of the frequency (key name)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when isn't possible to write the file
